description:
All-in-one media player to watch HD movies on Windows 8 (Compatible with Windows 10)


What's New in Version3.0.0.2 (Dec.12th, 2022)

1. Fixed program crash issue due to enabling hardware acceleration of partial GPU graphics cards.
2. Optimized program interface.
3. Fixed other known bugs.

*Clicked the Download button below and had no response?
Please copy and paste the below link to open in browser for downloading the latest version.
https://www.leawo.org/downloads/blu-ray-player.html
